IS_STRING: The {property} field must be a string.
IS_MONGOID: A valid MongoDB ID must be provided.
NEW_DRIVER_NAME_REQUIRED: The 'driver_full_name' field is required for a new driver.
IS_ENUM: The {property} field must be one of the following values: {enum}.
MIN_LENGTH: The {property} field must be at least {min} characters long.
IS_BOOLEAN: The {property} field must be a boolean value.
IS_POSITIVE: The {property} field must be a positive number.
MIN: The {property} field must be at least {min}.
